title: Ban 2 weeks for team flaming on you just over responses.
body: I don't understand this player base. I've started playing league with a friend and people just flame you for "throwing" because I'm just bad and it just makes me mad because I know im bad, but cant i play a game and try to get better? Instead they just insult me enough to report and I insult them back, get reported and banned for 2 weeks over them?

replies.body: Retaliation isn't okay. If they insulted you, and you insulted them, then all of you earned your consequences.
I don't even consider it "retaliation" honestly. You're participating in the same type of behavior you want them to be punished for, so why is it that you don't have the same expectation of yourself?

Sorry you got hit with the 2-week ban.

Riot only punishes you for your actions and chat. It's ok to be bad, but it's not ok to fire back with insults. You can mute players in game if you detect they're being toxic. It saves you a lot of grief because frankly, toxic people rarely change mid-game. 

You mentioned having just started playing league. Is this your first punishment?

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LlYE8Gg2,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-04-13T15:50:40.693+0000)
>
> Sorry you got hit with the 2-week ban.

> Riot only punishes you for your actions and chat. It's ok to be bad, but it's not ok to fire back with insults. You can mute players in game if you detect they're being toxic. It saves you a lot of grief because frankly, toxic people rarely change mid-game. 
> 
> You mentioned having just started playing league. Is this your first punishment?

I doubt it, he got a 2 week ban, no chat bans or anything, so he must have already been punished and warned several times. He is probably not new either. Him making a point to say that he was new, is odd to me, but maybe thats just me. I have posted on many different games boards. Never once have I announced myself as being new. It sounds like an attempt to appear vulnerable and important to Rito.

If you are having a hard time in normals, I would suggest bots until you get better at the basics.  The number one thing new players should learn is how not to die.  This will end up being more important than anything else.  And it is VERY easy, just need a little discipline.  Don't fight just to fight, don't chase, don't dive, don't wander through the jungle if you have no vision (btw, WARD WARD WARD), etc.  If a play seems risky, don't do it (until you learn what is safe, which just takes playing a lot of games).

Next ban is **permanent** (it means FOREVER) and will occur after a SINGLE deviation from the rules, so i strongly advise you to just unbind your chatbar, glue your "enter" key.

Be aware that : being negative in ANY MEAN, asking for others to report a player, etc will get you ban.

If you don't like what they are saying then mute them, report them, and move on with your life. They are not important enough for your words.

Just so you know, the punishment after a 14 day suspension is a permenant suspension, so be very mindful of what you say when you come off your punishment. If you are having difficulty determining what triggered your suapension you can post your logs here and we will help.
Did you not get a 10 and 25 game chat restriction?
Can be skipped in cases of severe flame/toxicity or in cases of hatespeech
